subtitle: "Visual Analytics to understand fishing behaviours and identify signatures of illegal fishing"

# Introduction

FishEye, a non-profit organization that focuses on illegal fishing, has assembled a knowledge graph from multiple structured and unstructured data sources.

The team will focus on **Mini-Challenge 2: Creating Signatures for Geo-Temporal Patterns**. This focuses on analyzing ship movements and shipping records to understand illegal fishing practices.

![](images/fredrik-ohlander-CbeApl8sxxw-unsplash.jpg)

# **Key objectives**

1.  Create visualisations to show patterns of ship movements and identify suspicious behaviours.

2.  Understand how commercial fishing community changed after a company was caught fishing illegally.

# References

For more information on VAST Challenge 2024 Mini-Challenge 2, please visit the official website [here](https://vast-challenge.github.io/2024/MC2.html).
